title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not being selected in external jar in Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the issue occurs.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, observe that the first match is not selected.
EB: After double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be selected.
SR: Ensure that the search results are correctly selected when double-clicking on a search result.
